text:
숙소 위치 확인
체크인
월요일 2024년 12월 23일
(오후 2:00 이후)
체크아웃
목요일 2024년 12월 26일
(오전 11:00 이전)
예약 관리하기 페이지에서 숙소 정책과 편의 시설/서비스에 관해서도 쉽게 확인할 수 있습니다.
숙소에 연락하기
숙소와 관련한 더 자세한 사항은 숙소로 직접 문의해 주시기 바랍니다.
[ 중요 사항 ]
Please note that upon check-in it is necessary to present the credit card used in the reservation process. The name on the credit card used for the booking should correspond to the guest staying at the property. For reservations made by a third party, you will need to complete an authorisation form and present a copy of the person's ID and credit card. Please note that electric and hybrid cars cannot be accommodated in the hotel's garage. 모든 투숙객은 체크인 시 사진이 부착된 유효한 신분증과 신용카드를 제시하셔야 합니다. 모든 별도 요청 사항은 체크인 시 가능한 경우에 한해 제공되며, 추가 비용이 부과될 수도 있음을 안내드립니다.
trans:
Check the accommodation location.
Check-in
Monday, December 23, 2024.
(after 2:00 PM)
Checkout
Thursday, December 26, 2024
(before 11:00 AM)
You can easily view the accommodation policy and amenities/services on the Manage Reservations page.
Contacting the accommodation.
For more details about the accommodation, please contact them directly.
[Important Information]
Please note that upon check-in it is necessary to present the credit card used in the reservation process. The name on the credit card used for the booking should correspond to the guest staying at the property. For reservations made by a third party, you will need to complete an authorisation form and present a copy of the person's ID and credit card. Please note that electric and hybrid cars cannot be accommodated in the hotel's garage. All guests are required to present a valid ID and a photo ID credit card at check-in. Please note that any special requests will be fulfilled based on availability at check-in and may incur additional charges.
